description: Renames existing columns in a datatable.

input.name: data
input.description: The datatable containing columns to be renamed.

input.name: mapping
input.description: The mapping of old column names to new column names.

input.name: discard
input.description:
Specifies whether to discard columns which are not included in `mapping`. 
If unspecified, defaults to `True` (unmapped columns are removed).

output.name: data
output.description: A datatable with the columns renamed.
